title: Click Show
body:
This component is interactive.

The learner sleects the item on the left to show the item on the right.

The left and right items can be image assets or text.

The layout position can be set to 'row' items stacked on top of each other (select left to show right) or 'column' items shown in a row (select top to show bottom).
instruction: Select the images to find out more.
